snippet.title: Mad Princess: The Great Gladiators [English Ver.] on DLsite!
snippet.description:
Available at: https://bit.ly/2XIQEM0

The Empire is at the peak of its prosperity.
Citizens live in Imperial cities scattered all across the mainland.

In one of these cities, known as the Imperial City of Caertina, ferocious bestiarii events are being held.
Beasts are captured in great numbers from the wilderness, trained, and pitted against gladiators.

You are a criminal destined to fight in the coliseum as a gladiator.
In order to escape from this hell, you must endure whatever brutal battles come your way.

(C)  Atorasoft
